ygData.subject: Re: Diamond Dust.....
ygData.msgSnippet: First of all What is the level of this guy? Is he 50th? Would be kida lame if the info was commining from someone not capable of handling this 50 level NPC. i
ygData.messageBody:
First of all What is the level of this guy? Is he 50th? Would be kida lame if
the info was commining from someone not capable of handling this 50 level
NPC. i Think its alot more lower NPC than he leads it on to be. As stated by
another person i seen here on Onelist, don't ever believe it till you see it
in a trade window for yourself. I feel that .....if ......the cutter will be
actually able to be done, the Diamond Dust component wouldn't be too far from
the already condenced tinkering supply location in Steamfront. Treat this
like it has been told to you as...(a rumor)...Nothing more. But ,1 thing is
for sure is that even if you do get the dust and make the item for it...I
wouldnt let him have it back until he gave you at least 1 dust per unit for
your trouble for you to keep.....Reguardless if it came out or
not...Especialy if he doesnt want to give you the acurate location of this
mysterious NPC...Sincerely Cloverleaf Lukyfeet, Gnome and Tinkerer (Fennin
Ro server)

In a message dated 1/4/00 12:30:38 PM Eastern Standard Time, cerceta@...
writes:

<< From: cerceta@...

OK don't get to excited but I have been asked by a fellow gnome to make
the gemcutter. He claims he can get the diamond dust for me, but won't
give up the npc that drops it. He claims that the npc is 50th level and
that the diamond dust is a rare drop item off it. I am thinking that this
could mean that the npc may be in the planes but that is merley speculation.
I wish he would give up the info but he is keeping it hidden from all for
another gnome. Well i hope this gives all you tinkerers hope:) Has anyone
discovered what the formula is for the Thermal Cloak? Where can i aquire
tattered belts? Are they merely patchwork belts or are they actually called
Tattered belts?


Grudup PuddleJumperTinkertot.....Tallon Zek *80 skill*
>>
